channel.title: Posts on The Strays
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Strays

item.description: Welcome to Lahboul Take in the sights Of fools, ghouls, and tools Without any rights You can shield your eyes and ears As you try desperately to blend
ABCs 123s and Do-re-mis School should set our children free Rather than shackle their creativity As they become target practice Resulting from our nation’s inactivity
Stimulation pulls my brain In like a magnet Won’t let me go Consumes all that I know As I try to unwind And process my time
Their hearts heavy Heads high Watched over By loved ones lost Strivers march down hilton Their fists raised Waving in the crisp fall air Cheered on
place is straight packed I could not believe My naive little eyes watching a ravens game during a late brunch in a filled bar surrounded by a pandemic
